channel.title: 316 ddsspec'd
channel.description: hey i just need to know how to change home on ddsspeced =] thanks

item.title: 316 ddsspec'd
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

i explained wrong/bad.

the misc.random(3) means that you subtract the 3 or add the 3 to the coord. The server will od this at random which means.
toX = 2947-2953
toY = 3372-3378

Read full topic

item.title: 316 ddsspec'd
item.dc:creator: @wat72 wat72
item.description:
@wat72 wrote:

[quote=“Darkning, post:2, topic:261298”]go to your player.java and search
initial x and y coordinates

then you should see

// initial x and y coordinates of the player heightLevel = 0; // the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper // initialization packet toX = 2950+misc.random(3); toY = 3375+misc.random(3);

the toX andtoY is the coords.

the +misc.random(3) means that the coord (2950) is subject to change

  • or -3 at random.[/quote]How can + equal minus? it wouldn’t return a negative number like -6 to equal -3, it would just be positive.

Read full topic
